main event: A witness reported seeing a brilliant white object moving at a high rate of speed in a northwesterly direction on March 25, 1959.
interesting points: The object was at an altitude of about 3000 feet and diminished in size but not in brilliance as it moved away., This was the sixth similar sighting for the observer in 18 months., The observer previously skeptical about UFOs felt compelled to acknowledge the sighting., The object allegedly fired rapid pulses while descending at an angle., The report stated that the object exhibited movements characteristic of a flying saucer, indicating potential intelligent control.
sighted object: brilliant white object resembling a flattened sphere or disc
witness description: The witness is a confirmed skeptic who observed the object through a telescope.
